content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been successfully placed on the map. Although existing furnaces were referenced during smelting (e.g. a furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) and a copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)), no new building or assembly—such as a Lab—was created.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage Errors
 – When invoking get_entities, use its correct signature. Avoid passing unsupported keyword arguments (such as 'radius') and ensure that the number of positional arguments matches the function’s definition.

• Inventory and Placement Validations
 – Verify that a required structure (for example, a Lab) is available in the inventory before attempting to place it. Lack of proper inventory leads to placement failures.

• Crafting Dependency Management
 – Ensure that all sub-ingredients for complex items (e.g. labs) are available in sufficient quantity. Failures citing missing items like iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, or copper-cables indicate that the production chain and resource acquisition need to be secured before initiating crafting.

• None Iteration Safeguards
 – When processing results from entity queries, check that the returned value is not None (or provide a fallback, such as an empty list) to prevent iteration errors.
